data.actual_result: The Save button's colour is off, it's pretty dark grey (on disabled state barely readable)
data.expected_result: The Save button is the same shade of white as the Back button (and the save when using the dark theme since these settings use the same appearance in both)
data.short_description: Save button in User Settings => Account is dark grey-ish on light theme (compared to say the Back button next to it)
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure to have appearance set to the light theme - Go to User Settings => Account, where you can set e.g. username - Observe the Save button colour, it's dark grey-ish (both disabled/before any changes and enabled/after changing e.g. username, the button is dark compared to the Back button) - You can compare it with the Dark theme (this part of the interface should look the same, the Save button here is properly white/same as Back)
